requirements.summary: Diagnose and resolve all deployment errors preventing successful build and deployment to Internet Computer
acceptanceCriteria: Application deploys successfully to the Internet Computer
All canisters are operational after deployment
Frontend can successfully connect to backend canister

file_operations.description: Review and fix any TypeScript errors, incorrect imports, or component reference issues that prevent compilation. Ensure all route definitions are valid and all imported components exist.
Verify all component imports are correct, fix any missing or incorrect paths, and ensure all referenced components (headers, footers, sections) are properly imported and used.
Fix any import errors or missing component references. Ensure the page structure is valid and all dependencies resolve correctly.
Correct any TypeScript compilation errors, invalid imports, or component reference issues.
Resolve any import path errors or missing dependencies that prevent the page from building successfully.
Fix any compilation errors related to imports, component references, or TypeScript type issues.
Ensure all navigation links are correctly typed and all imported UI components resolve properly. Fix any TypeScript errors.
Verify imports are correct and the component exports properly. Resolve any compilation issues.

requirements.summary: Ensure all frontend imports and component references are valid with no missing dependencies or circular imports
acceptanceCriteria: All React components render without runtime errors
No missing or incorrect import paths

file_operations.description: Audit all import statements for correct paths and valid module references. Ensure react-router-dom imports match installed version. Verify all page components exist at their import paths.
Validate all import paths for components, verify component exports match imports, and ensure no circular dependency chains exist. Fix relative path inconsistencies.
Check and correct all import statements, ensure referenced components exist and are properly exported, and validate TypeScript types are correctly imported.
Review all imports for accuracy, fix any incorrect relative paths, and ensure all UI components are imported from correct shadcn/ui paths.
Validate import paths are correct, verify all imported dependencies are declared in package.json, and fix any missing or malformed imports.
Ensure all imports resolve to existing files, fix any incorrect paths to shared components or utilities, and validate no circular import chains.
Verify all import statements are syntactically correct, check that imported components are properly exported, and ensure react-router-dom Link component is correctly imported.
Validate all imports exist and are correctly typed, ensure the component is properly exported for use in other files, and fix any TypeScript import errors.

Check all imports including Button component from shadcn/ui, verify image asset paths are correct (frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-community.dim_1200x600.png), and ensure no missing dependencies.
Validate icon imports are correct, ensure Card component imports from proper shadcn/ui path, and verify image references (frontend/public/assets/generated/icon-*.dim_128x128.png files) are accurate.
